def is_prime(number):

function hasDuplicateValue(array) {
  var existingNumbers = []
  for (var i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
    if (existingNumbers[array[i]] === undefined) {
      existingNumbers[array[i]] = 1
    } else {
      return true
    }
  }
  return false
}

    int factorial(int n) {

	else

}
